## The Bitcoin Chronicles - Arc 2.F.3 - The Surrender of Delay

As the Entanglement Bridge matures, institutions built on delay confront their final choice: cling to procedural time or surrender to instant settlement. This chapter follows the moment when delay ceases to be defensible and becomes optional â€” and what happens when power built on friction must either transform or dissolve.

---
